flawed_nl_solution:
The truck driver can go 3 * 12 = <<3*12=63>>63 miles on the gas in his tank.
He needs to go 90 - 63 = <<90-63=27>>27 more miles.
Thus, the truck driver needs to put 27 / 3 = <<27/3=9>>9 more gallons of gas in his semi.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
